title: Can we offer Sacrifice (Qurbani / Udhiya) on behalf of the Prophet ﷺ‎? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: what is prohibited and an innovation is to slaughter something specifically for the Prophet al-assad sana this is totally prohibited none of the Companions had ever done in this nor the turban or tablet Abilene and this is foolish because anything that you do among the good deeds the Prophet will be automatically accredited for it insha Allah
